feed.title: BookLore Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.0.33
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

🚀 Features

  • Display chapter name in title and fix top layout for epubs (#57) by @adityachandelgit
  • Prevent buttons from overlapping the EPUB content area & Display chapter name in the header section (#54) by @adityachandelgit
  • Add read, send, shelf and download buttons to the book description page (#51) by @adityachandelgit

📖 Documentation

  • Remove .env file dependency and define environment variables directly… (#56) by @adityachandelgit

⚙️ CI/CD

  • Add docker image link to release (#50) by @adityachandelgit

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.0.34
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Fix metadata viewer send custom button (#62) by @adityachandelgit
  • Remove contributors in drafter and docker image link (#60) by @adityachandelgit

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.0.35
entry.content:
🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Extract and set the series name and index for EPUBs (#69) by @adityachandelgit

📖 Documentation

  • Remove unnecessary comments from docker compose (#68) by @adityachandelgit
  • Add missing mariadb creds (#66) by @adityachandelgit

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.0.39
entry.content:

⚙️ CI/CD
